9. "The Others" (Alejandro Amenábar) - A ghost story set in the early 20th century that will keep you guessing until the very end.
10. "Suspiria" (Luca Guadagnino) - A visually stunning and eerie remake of Dario Argento's 1977 horror classic, about a young dancer who uncovers dark secrets at a prestigious dance academy.
